snippet: A passenger plane with 53 passengers and five crew members aboard crashed into a river in Taiwan’s capital, Taipei, shortly after takeoff on Wednesday morning.
abstract: TransAsia Airways flight crashes into river in Taipei, Taiwan, during takeoff, killing 31 people and injuring 15; crash is second for airline in period of six months, raising safety questions.
lead_paragraph: A passenger plane with 53 passengers and five crew members aboard crashed into a river in Taiwan’s capital, Taipei, shortly after takeoff on Wednesday morning.

headline.main: Plane Clips Road and Crashes in Taiwan, Killing at Least 31
headline.print_headline: Plane Clips Road and Crashes in Taiwan, Killing at Least 31
